Char Siu Sauce

Preperation time: 1 minutes

Cooking time: N/A

Servings: 1 cup

Ingedients

  • ⅓ cup hoisin sauce
  • ¼ cup honey
  • ¼ cup dark soy sauce
  • 3 tablespoons dry sherry or 3 tablespoons chinese shaosing wine
  • 1 teaspoon Chinese five spice powder

Directions

  1. Combine all ingredients in a small bowl.
